toto.selections.select_peaks_and_throughs¶

Extract all the peaks and throughs from a timeseries.

Parameters¶

input_array(Panda Obj)

The Panda dataframe.

Examples:¶

>>> df['selected']=select_peaks_and_throughs.select_peaks_and_throughs(
df['signal'].copy())
>>>
toto.selections.select_peaks_and_throughs.select_peaks_and_throughs(input_array, args={})[source]¶
